text: 3.11: Hab 2.4; Ro 1.17; Ga 2.16; Hi 10.38Nza khueŋ kaŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme nɨman Moses suaŋgi tɨvi zɨn vui ne nzuav, Fhe Bakɨme tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgir mben kaai fhuvara. Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gap khaŋ nzuai, “Mba guigira Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, Fhe Bakɨme tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigir mben kamɨnga. Mbe vhɨra zazera mbara muuŋgip ki bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ ndigip kɨrga.”
